data.name: Worldwide Wallet
data.description: The Worldwide Wallet is a prepaid Mastercard that lets you lock in your exchange rates before you travel or shop. Pay no foreign transaction fees when you use your card to spend and enjoy access to Flight Delay Pass.

features.additionalInfo: Online , Mobile and telephone banking is available

features.additionalValue: Add your Worldwide Wallet to Google Pay or Samsung Pay, or use your card to tap and go.
Use card for POS, tap and go & ATM withdrawals

features.additionalInfo: Transfer money to and from your Worldwide Wallet and convert AUD into foreign currencies while you?re on the go in your Mobile Banking app.
Lock in your budget by converting your loaded AUD ahead of time and feel safe and secure from fraudulent transactions with Mastercard Zero Liability protection
Maximum annual load for any given 12-month period AUD 100,000
ATM withdrawals in a 24-hour period AUD 2,000

features.additionalValue: Account limit - Total point of sale
features.additionalInfo: Total point of sale or online purchases in a 24-hour period AUD 15,000
Your Mastercard gives you access to Priceless Cities with unforgettable experiences in the cities where you live and travel.
Get cashback when you shop overseas with your Worldwide Wallet, for details please refer to Mastercard Travel Rewards.
You and a companion can get access to over 1,000 lounges if your flight is delayed for 2 hours or more. Visit the Mastercard Flight Delay Pass website to pre-register your flight. T&Cs apply.
Pick up cards from any branch and activate them online, or order online from home and receive your cards in 5-8 business days.
Withdraw money or check your balance at overseas ATMs using your Worldwide Wallet

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant must be an existing Bank of Melbourne customer who is already registered for Internet Banking

fees.name: ATM Transaction Fees - AUD
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever you use an ATM to transact in the following currencies (unless at a Bank of Melbourne ATM, Westpac Group ATM, Westpac Group Partner ATM, or a Global ATM Alliance ATM). This fee will be paid from your Available Balance in accordance with the Drawdown Sequence.

fees.name: ATM Withdrawal Fee at Global ATM Alliance ATMs
ATM Balance Enquiry Fee - AUD
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever you make an enquiry in respect of your Available Balance in the following currencies using an ATM (unless at a Bank of Melbourne ATM, Westpac Group ATM, Westpac Group Partner ATM, or a Global ATM Alliance ATM). This fee will be paid from your Available Balance in accordance with the Drawdown Sequence. This fee does not apply if you check your Available Balance through Online Banking and the Westpac App.
